name: 540 Roundhouse Kick – Martial Arts Technique
description:
This page provides details on the martial arts 540 roundhouse kick. This kick is an advanced version of the traditional roundhouse kick. For information on other martial arts kicks (i.e. axe kick), please visit Black Belt Wiki’s main kicking techniques page.

All 540 degree kicks are spectacular spinning kicks. They are often used for for kicking demonstrations and breaking techniques but they are seen as less practical for self-defense. The 540 roundhouse kick is a more advanced version of the Tornado Kick because the martial artists needs to rotate more with the 540 kick.

Martial arts kicks and all other martial arts techniques should only be practiced under the supervision of a trained martial arts instructor in order to prevent injuries and to ensure the proper technique is utilized. In addition, all martial arts techniques and training should be used safely and responsibly.
